rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {DWG2504}

description: This unit provides students with a further opportunity to relate to a more expansive definition of drawing and encourages students, through bold graphic experimentation, to maximise their capacity for individual invention and expression in responding to a variety of perceptive and conceptual processes other resources to develop their individual practice in an increasingly informed manner.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
